attributes.action: enact government policy to include at the bottom of every ballot-paper, whether in a local or national election, a box marked "No candidate or party adequately represents my political views",  or similar.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The strength of our democracy is undermined by the lack of opportunity for those voters disillusioned with the current state of British politics to be counted, and for the result of such a count to be announced along with that for the election candidates.

The need for this is plain, given the repeated comments from politicians about voter apathy, which are in a large part simply wrong.

We are said to live in the cradle of democracy, but millions of voters feel excluded and ignored.

The above would go some way to redressing this, and might cause all political parties to think long and hard about who they actually represent.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
